filemanager.blackList.name: dde-file-manager plugin blacklist
filemanager.blackList.name[zh_CN]: 文件管理器插件黑名单列表
filemanager.blackList.description[zh_CN]: 文件管理器插件黑名单列表，黑名单中的插件将无法被启用
filemanager.blackList.description: List of plugins disabled by the dde-file-manager, blacklisted plugins will not be enabled

filemanager.disablelist.name: dde-file-manager plugin disablelist
filemanager.disablelist.name[zh_CN]: 文件管理器插件启停列表
filemanager.disablelist.description[zh_CN]: 文件管理器插件启停列表，列表中的插件将无法被启用，它的优先级低于黑名单
filemanager.disablelist.description: The dde-file-manager plugin start and stop list, the plugin in the list will not be enabled, it is lower priority than the black list

desktop.blackList.name: dde-desktop plugins blacklist
desktop.blackList.description[zh_CN]: 桌面插件黑名单列表，黑名单中的插件将无法被启用
desktop.blackList.description: List of plugins disabled by the dde-desktop, plugins in the blacklist will not be able to be enabled

server.blackList.description: List of plugins disabled by the dde-file-manager-server, plugins in the blacklist will not be able to be enabled

daemon.blackList.name[zh_CN]: 文件管理器守护进程插件黑名单列表
daemon.blackList.description[zh_CN]: 文件管理器守护进程插件黑名单列表，黑名单中的插件将无法被启用
daemon.blackList.description: List of plugins disabled by the dde-file-manager-daemon, plugins in the blacklist will not be able to be enabled

filedialog.blackList.description[zh_CN]: 文件管理器文件选择对话框插件黑名单列表，黑名单中的插件将无法被启用
